Actions:

The proposal must be submitted for approval within the same timeframe.

Should further information be required in order to do so effectively by the nominated deadline, respond to the person who has identified the actions required within MBuild or contact the person directly.

Any other reports containing these issue which are subsequently distributed via Aconex as a follow up, do not change the deadline to address the required actions nominated within MBuild.
